technical_accuracy.description: Correctness of technical knowledge and Excel syntax

excellent.description: Perfect or near-perfect technical accuracy, demonstrates expert-level knowledge

good.description: Strong technical knowledge with minor gaps or errors

satisfactory.description: Basic technical understanding with some notable gaps

needs_improvement.description: Limited technical accuracy, significant knowledge gaps

depth_of_knowledge.description: Understanding of Excel concepts beyond surface level

excellent.description: Demonstrates deep understanding of Excel concepts and their interconnections

good.description: Good understanding of intermediate to advanced concepts

satisfactory.description: Adequate depth for basic to intermediate tasks

needs_improvement.description: Surface-level understanding, needs to develop deeper knowledge

problem_solving_approach.description: Logical thinking and structured approach to Excel problems

excellent.description: Excellent analytical thinking with logical, efficient solutions

good.description: Good problem-solving approach with structured methodology

satisfactory.description: Basic problem-solving skills with some logical reasoning

communication_clarity.description: Ability to clearly explain Excel concepts and solutions

excellent.description: Clear, concise explanations with excellent technical communication

good.description: Good communication skills with mostly clear explanations

satisfactory.description: Adequate communication with some clarity issues

needs_improvement.description: Communication needs improvement for better clarity

expert.description: Expert-level Excel proficiency suitable for senior roles and training others
characteristics: Mastery of advanced features like VBA, Power Query, Power Pivot
Can design complex financial models and automated solutions
Demonstrates best practices and optimization techniques
Can mentor others and lead Excel-based projects

advanced.description: Strong Excel skills suitable for professional roles requiring complex analysis
characteristics: Proficient with advanced formulas, pivot tables, and data analysis
Can create dynamic dashboards and reports
Understands data modeling concepts
Can work independently on complex Excel projects

intermediate.description: Competent Excel user with good practical skills for most business tasks
characteristics: Comfortable with formulas, functions, and basic data analysis
Can create charts and basic pivot tables
Understands formatting and data management
Suitable for roles requiring regular Excel use

basic.description: Foundational Excel knowledge suitable for entry-level positions with training
characteristics: Knows basic formulas and functions
Can perform simple data entry and formatting
Understands basic chart creation
Requires training for advanced features

novice.description: New to Excel with minimal knowledge, requires comprehensive training
characteristics: Limited to very basic Excel operations
Struggles with formula syntax and concepts
Needs extensive training before professional use
May be suitable for roles with minimal Excel requirements
